name: Wander to the Beach MiniComic
description:
$4.00 gets you a 3.5"x4.5" 8 page comic introducing the Wander gang. Black and white inside with color cover. Price includes US shipping.

Fantz, Piper, and Arilsden are three young women out to seek different fortunes.  Fate brings them together for a bit, and they have misadventures galore.

Main Wander site: http://wanderventure.tumblr.com
Another adventure starts in June.
